snippet: While supporters of the Syrian uprising have done a remarkable job of documenting the Arab League observer mission, viewers of one television station in neighboring Lebanon are getting a very different picture of events in Syria.
abstract: While supporters of the Syrian uprising have done a remarkable job of documenting the Arab League observer mission, viewers of one television station in neighboring Lebanon are getting a very different picture of events in Syria.
lead_paragraph: While supporters of the Syrian uprising have done a remarkable job of documenting the Arab League observer mission  filling YouTube channels with video of outraged citizens describing the violent crackdown on dissent by the Syrian government  viewers of one television station in neighboring Lebanon are getting a very different picture of events in Syria.

headline.main: On Hezbollah TV, Syrians Who Support Assad Claim to Be the Victims

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
